Headline: Purple Line Service Temporarily Suspended
ShortDescription: Service on the Purple Line has been temporarily suspended due to track switching problems.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Service on the Purple Line has been temporarily suspended due to track switching problems.

Shuttle buses requested to provide connecting service through the affected area between Howard and Linden.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

We are working to restore service as soon as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Allow extra travel time.
